TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class HierarchicalDataSourceControl : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataSourceControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource
Public MustInherit Class HierarchicalDataSourceControl Inherits Control Implements IHierarchicalDataSource
public ref class HierarchicalDataSourceControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IHierarchicalDataSource
type HierarchicalDataSourceControl = class inherit Control interface IHierarchicalDataSource

summary.span: 为表示分层数据的数据源控件提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for data source controls that represent hierarchical data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持控件数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件可以绑定到数据并以一致的方式呈现数据。ASP.NET supports a controls data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion. 绑定到数据的 Web 服务器控件称为数据绑定控件，便于绑定的类称为数据源控件。Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate binding are called data source controls. 数据源控件可以表示任意数据源：文件、流、关系数据库、业务对象等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on. 数据源控件以一致的方式向数据绑定控件提供数据，而与基础数据的源或格式无关。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 表示分层数据的数据源控件派生自 类，而表示数据的列表或表的数据源控件派生自 类。Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the class, while data source controls that represent lists or tables of data derive from the class. 类是 接口的基实现，该接口定义了一个方法来检索与数据源控件关联的分层数据源视图对象，。The class is the base implementation of the interface, which defines a single method to retrieve hierarchical data source view objects associated with the data source control, . 您可以将数据源控件视为对基础数据（称为数据源视图对象）的 对象及其关联视图的组合。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated views on the underlying data, called data source view objects. 尽管表示表格数据的数据源控件通常只与一个命名视图关联，但 类支持数据源控件所表示的每个层次结构数据级别的数据源视图。While data source controls that represent tabular data are typically associated with only one named view, the class supports a data source view for each level of hierarchical data that the data source control represents. 分层数据级别由唯一分层路径标识，该路径传递到 `viewPath` 参数中的 方法。The level of hierarchical data is identified by a unique hierarchical path, passed to the method in the `viewPath` parameter. 每个 对象都为所表示的分层级别定义数据源控件的功能，并执行 insert、update、delete 和 sort 等操作。Each object defines the capabilities of a data source control for the hierarchical level represented, and performs operations such as insert, update, delete, and sort. 派生自 类的 Web 服务器控件（如 ）使用分层数据源控件绑定到分层数据。Web server controls that derive from the class, such as , use hierarchical data source controls to bind to hierarchical data. 数据源控件以控件的形式实现，以实现声明性持久性，并可选择允许参与状态管理。Data source controls are implemented as controls to enable declarative persistence and to optionally permit participation in state management. 数据源控件没有可视呈现，因此不支持主题。Data source controls have no visual rendering, and therefore do not support themes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展抽象 类和 类，并实现 和 接口，以创建检索文件系统信息的分层数据源控件。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the abstract class and the class, and implement the and interfaces to create a hierarchical data source control that retrieves file system information. `FileSystemDataSource` 控件使 Web 服务器控件可以绑定到 对象并显示基本的文件系统信息。The `FileSystemDataSource` control enables Web server controls to bind to objects and display basic file system information. 示例中的 `FileSystemDataSource` 类提供 方法的实现，该方法检索 `FileSystemDataSourceView` 对象。The `FileSystemDataSource` class in the example provides the implementation of the method, which retrieves a `FileSystemDataSourceView` object. `FileSystemDataSourceView` 对象从基础数据存储中检索数据，在本例中为 Web 服务器上的文件系统信息。The `FileSystemDataSourceView` object retrieves the data from the underlying data storage, in this case the file system information on the Web server. 出于安全目的，仅当数据源控件正用于本地主机和身份验证方案时才会显示文件系统信息，并且仅从使用数据源控件的 Web 窗体页所在的虚拟目录开始。For security purposes, file system information is displayed only if the data source control is being used in a localhost, authenticated scenario, and only starts with the virtual directory that the Web Forms page using the data source control resides in. 最后，提供两个实现 和 的类，以包装 `FileSystemDataSource` 使用的 对象。Finally, two classes that implement and are provided to wrap the objects that `FileSystemDataSource` uses. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `FileSystemDataSource` 示例以声明方式将 控件绑定到文件系统数据。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to file system data using the `FileSystemDataSource` example. [!code-aspx-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1/CS/webform7cs.aspx#50)] [!code-aspx-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1/VB/webform7vb.aspx#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法提供 类的默认实现，该实现只返回 `null`。This method provides the default implementation for the class, which simply returns `null`. 派生自 类的类将重写此方法，并提供实现以返回派生自 的强类型视图。Classes that derive from the class override this method and provide an implementation to return a strongly typed view that derives from . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在扩展 类以返回强类型 对象的类中重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a class that extends the class to return a strongly typed object. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#1)]

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知数据绑定控件：基础数据源或缓存在内存中的数据已更改，控件应重新绑定，并且应执行任何必要的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source or the data cached in memory has changed, that the control should rebind, and that any necessary work should be performed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event DataSourceChanged As EventHandler Implements System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource

summary.span: 更改 的方式对数据绑定控件产生一定影响时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the has changed in some way that affects data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 当数据绑定控件的属性或基础数据在某种程度上发生更改时，会引发 事件，此方法会影响数据绑定控件及其数据之间的数据绑定。The event is raised when the properties of a data-bound control or the underlying data has changed in some way that affects the data bindings between a data-bound control and its data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 作为 接口进行操作时，客户端将调用 方法。The method is called by clients when a is manipulated as an interface. 它委托给 方法，派生类将重写以返回强类型 对象。It delegates to the method, which derived classes override to return strongly typed objects.
